name: FetchStoragePolicyAssignments
description:
Retrieve storage policy assignments for enterprise or user.

Use this tool to fetch all storage policy assignments associated with a specific enterprise or user, providing insights into storage management configurations.

parameters.name: target_type_for_assignments
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return storage policy assignments for a 'user' or 'enterprise'.

value_schema.description: The target type to return assignments for.

parameters.name: target_user_or_enterprise_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user or enterprise to fetch storage policy assignments for.

value_schema.description: The ID of the user or enterprise to return assignments for.

parameters.name: pagination_marker
parameters.description: Defines the position marker to start returning results for pagination. Requires 'usemarker' to be true.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: resolved_for_type
parameters.description: The target type to return assignments for.

value_schema.description: The target type to return assignments for.

parameters.name: resolved_for_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user or enterprise to return assignments for.

value_schema.description: The ID of the user or enterprise to return assignments for.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
